Caleb's Favorite BMX Riders

Here is a list and a link to a profile of some of my favorite BMX riders. It is difficult to make a list like this because I have yet to meet a rider that I did not like and each rider has an independent style.

  • Mat Hoffman
  • Rick Thorn (I got this guys autograph)
  • Dave Osato
  • Jamie Bestwick
  • Steve Crandall (shook his hand)
  • Ryan Nyquist
  • Dave Mirra
  • Ron Kimler
  • Dustin Griess
